< prg > −− > class i {{< decl >} < main f > {< funct def >}
  <decl> --> <type> <decl'>
    <type> --> int
    <decl'> --> [] i = new <type> [ n ];
      <type> --> int
  <main_f> --> void main(){{<decl>}<st_list>}
    <decl> --> <type> <decl'>
      <type> --> int
      <decl'> --> i;
    <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
      <st> --> while <l_exp> <st>
        <l_exp> --> <rel_exp><l_exp'>
          <rel_exp> --> (<exp><rel_exp><exp>)
            <exp> --> <term><exp'>
              <term> --> <prim><term'>
                <prim> --> i <prim'>
                  <prim> --> <index>
                    <index> --> e
                <term'> --> e
              <exp> --> e
            <rel_op> --> ==
            <exp> --> <term><exp'>
              <term> --> <prim><term'>
                <prim> --> n
                <term'> --> e
              <exp> --> e
          <l_exp'> --> e
        <st> --> <comp_st>
          <comp_st> --> <st_list>;
            <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
              <st> --> if <l_exp> <st> else <st>
                <l_exp> --> <rel_exp><l_exp'>
                  <rel_exp> --> (<exp><rel_exp><exp>)
                    <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                      <term> --> <prim><term'>
                        <prim> --> i <prim'>
                          <prim> --> <index>
                            <index> --> e
                        <term'> --> e
                      <exp> --> e
                    <rel_op> --> !=
                    <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                      <term> --> <prim><term'>
                        <prim> --> n
                        <term'> --> e
                      <exp> --> e
                  <l_exp'> --> e
                <st> --> <comp_st>
                  <comp_st> --> <st_list>;
                    <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
                      <st> --> i <st'>
                        <st'> --> (<v_list>);
                          <vlist> --> <elem>
                            <elem> --> i <index>
                              <index> --> e
                      <st> --> return <exp>;
                        <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                          <term> --> <prim><term'>
                            <prim> --> n
                            <term'> --> e
                          <exp> --> e
                <st> --> <comp_st>
                  <comp_st> --> <st_list>;
                    <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
                      <st> --> if <l_exp> <st> else <st>
                        <l_exp> --> <rel_exp><l_exp'>
                          <rel_exp> --> (<exp><rel_exp><exp>)
                            <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                              <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                <prim> --> i <prim'>
                                  <prim> --> <index>
                                    <index> --> e
                                <term'> --> e
                              <exp> --> e
                            <rel_op> --> ==
                            <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                              <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                <prim> --> 'c'
                                <term'> --> e
                              <exp> --> e
                          <l_exp'> --> e
                        <st> --> <comp_st>
                          <comp_st> --> <st_list>;
                            <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
                              <st> --> i <st'>
                                <st'> --> <asg_st>;
                                  <asg_st> --> <index> = <asg_st'>
                                    <index> --> e
                                    <asg_st'> --> System.in.<type>();
                                      <type> --> int
                              <st> --> System.out(<vlist>);
                                <vlist> --> <elem>
                                  <elem> --> i <index>
                                    <index> --> e
                        <st> --> <comp_st>
                          <comp_st> --> <st_list>;
                            <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
                              <st> --> i <st'>
                                <st'> --> <asg_st>;
                                  <asg_st> --> <index> = <asg_st'>
                                    <index> --> e
                                    <asg_st'> --> <exp>;
                                      <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                                        <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                          <prim> --> 'c'
                                          <term'> --> e
                                        <exp> --> e
                              <st> --> i <st'>
                                <st'> --> <asg_st>;
                                  <asg_st> --> <index> = <asg_st'>
                                    <index> --> e
                                    <asg_st'> --> <exp>;
                                      <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                                        <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                          <prim> --> i <prim'>
                                            <prim> --> <index>
                                              <index> --> [ <exp> ]
                                                <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                                                  <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                                    <prim> --> n
                                                    <term'> --> <multi_op><prim><term'>
                                                      <add_op> --> *
                                                      <prim> --> n
                                                      <term'> --> e
                                                  <exp'> --> - <add_op><term><exp'>
                                                    <add_op> --> +
                                                    <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                                      <prim> --> n
                                                      <term'> --> e
                                                    <exp> --> e
                                          <term'> --> e
                                        <exp> --> e
                              <st> --> i <st'>
                                <st'> --> <asg_st>;
                                  <asg_st> --> <index> = <asg_st'>
                                    <index> --> e
                                    <asg_st'> --> <exp>;
                                      <exp> --> <term><exp'>
                                        <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                          <prim> --> n
                                          <term'> --> e
                                        <exp'> --> - <add_op><term><exp'>
                                          <add_op> --> +
                                          <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                            <prim> --> n
                                            <term'> --> <multi_op><prim><term'>
                                              <add_op> --> /
                                              <prim> --> n
                                              <term'> --> <multi_op><prim><term'>
                                                <add_op> --> %
                                                <prim> --> n
                                                <term'> --> e
                                          <exp'> --> - <add_op><term><exp'>
                                            <add_op> --> +
                                            <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                              <prim> --> n
                                              <term'> --> e
                                            <exp'> --> - <add_op><term><exp'>
                                              <add_op> --> -
                                              <term> --> <prim><term'>
                                                <prim> --> n
                                                <term'> --> e
                                              <exp> --> e
  <funct_def> --> <type> i ( <par_list> ) { { <decl> } <st_list> }
    <type> --> int
    <par_list> --> < p_type > i{, <p_type> i}
      <p_type> --> <type> <p_type'>
        <type> --> int
        <p_type'> --> e
    <st_list> --> <st> {<st>}
      <st> --> System.out(<vlist>);
        <vlist> --> <elem>
          <elem> --> i <index>
            <index> --> e
